persona.name: Harley
persona.bio: Harley, a 52-year-old full-time trader, is an expert in the crypto market known for their cautious and patient approach. Despite a generally pessimistic outlook, Harley's ability to wait for the perfect moment has led to a successful trading career. Their extensive experience allows them to navigate market fluctuations with a keen eye for detail, ensuring strategic and well-timed investments.
